item.title: Teach me the basics of iMovie Video Editing for Youtube for my Gym - Upwork
item.description:
I need someone to teach me the basics of iMovie video editing for youtube. I own a small local gym and am just intimidated by the whole idea of making youtube content. I have a tech background so should pick it up easily and I am not looking to be as good as a pro. I just want to be able to make my own daily posts and shorts about exercise or nutrition. My estimation is 4-8 hours of time where we just screenshare and you guide me. I know I can watch how to videos (and I have) but I learn better with 1:1 tutoring.

Hourly Range: $30.00-$45.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 20:35 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Apple iMovie, Video Editing, Education
Skills: Apple iMovie, Video Editing, Education
Country: United States

item.title: Video Editor - Business History Youtube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Video Editor

Location: Remote

Job Overview:

We are seeking a skilled and creative Video Editor to join our Business History YouTube team on a contract basis. The primary responsibility will be to gather premium stock footage and edit it according to a provided script and voiceover. The goal is to create 18 high-quality videos (8+ minutes each)  within the contract period. There is potential for full-time employment at the end of the contract based on performance.

Key Responsibilities:

- Source premium stock footage relevant to the given script.
- Edit video footage to create cohesive and engaging videos.
- Integrate provided voiceovers seamlessly into the videos.
- Add copyright-free background music that enhances the video's overall appeal and aligns with the script's tone.
- Ensure all videos adhere to the provided script and meet the company's quality standards.
- Collaborate with the project manager to ensure the timely delivery of all videos.

Example Video:

To understand the style and quality of videos we aim to produce, please refer to the following example (Note: this is not our YouTube channel): (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iUFpUcXQtn4).


Requirements:

- Proven experience as a Video Editor or similar role.
- Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar tools.
- Strong understanding of video editing principles and techniques.
- Ability to source high-quality stock footage.
- Excellent attention to detail and creative thinking.
- Strong organizational and time management skills to meet the tight deadline.
- Good communication skills to understand and implement project requirements.


Application Process:
Interested candidates are invited to submit the following:
- A portfolio or demo reel showcasing a range of video editing work.


Additional Information:

- This is a remote position, and the candidate must have access to a reliable internet connection and necessary editing software.
- The project is time-sensitive, and the candidate must be able to commit to the full duration of the contract and meet the delivery schedule.
- Successful completion of this contract may lead to a full-time employment opportunity.

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 22, 2024 20:18 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Stock Footage, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video, Education, Video Intro & Outro, Adobe After Effects, Stock Imagery
Skills: Stock Footage, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video, Education, Video Intro & Outro, Adobe After Effects, Stock Imagery
Country: USA
click to apply

item.title: Youtube Videos editor and creator - Upwork
item.description:
You need to have very good skills at adobe premier pro and after effects. We will cover the universe, robots and future related videos. so you will have to make the video very cinematic with your skills. You will be given script and audio file and you will be the one to make a video edit from scratch. This means you will have to cover all the pictures, videos and audio effects while making sure the video does not come into copyright law of youtube. We need someone with past experience in creating youtube videos. You will be hired for a long period of time if you are a great fit for our company.

You are welcome to show some of your previous work samples.

You will have to pass a small test in order to get hired for this position.


Write "46" at the end of your proposal to let us know that you have read everything in our job proposal.



Budget: $40
Posted On: June 22, 2024 20:18 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Fiction, Dystopian, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Explainer Video
Skills: Fiction, Dystopian, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Explainer Video
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: UK🇬🇧 Content Creators needed!🤳 - Upwork
item.description:
Hello there, dear creators!😊

We hope you're doing well! We are ContentJet🚀, a UGC Digital Marketing company and we are looking for creator prospects for our client Oaksha!!

-Ages: 19-40

-Beautiful creators

-Product would need to be shipped to them

-Rate: $35 USD per video plus the free product🤩

-You would need to provide your address and phone number if you are chosen!🏠

-Directions will be provided, but not a full script❗❗

-Website: https://www.oakcha.com/en-ca

Scripts(not full) and Direction will be provided. We will require RAW videos as we edit them ourselves. :)

If you're interested, please, send your UGC portfolio or 2-3 videos of your previous UGC work (talking to the camera) so we can see your camera presence!😍

Looking forward to start collaborating with you!🚀

Thank you!😊
ContentJet.io



Budget: $80
Posted On: June 22, 2024 20:12 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Advertising, UGC, German, Creative Writing, Content Creation
Skills: Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Advertising, UGC, German, Creative Writing, Content Creation
Country: Canada
click to apply
